column2: Catching all exceptions with a generic catch clause may be overly broad, which can make errors harder to diagnose.
An assignment to a local variable that is not used later on, or whose value is always overwritten, has no effect.
column4: This assignment to [["lock2"|"relative:///CWE832_Unlock_Not_Locked__Object_Thread_01.cs:21:20:21:24"]] is useless, since its value is never read.
